```{r, eval=FALSE}
if (!requireNamespace("tidyverse", quietly = TRUE))
  install.packages("tidyverse")
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
```

# Question

## Which region of CgPho4 underlies its reduced Pho2-dependence?

![place holder]()

---

# Approach

- Swap "components" between ScPho4 and CgPho4 (Chimera)
- Measure chimera's TF activity with and w/o Pho2. How?
    - Chimera + Pho2 -> _PHO5_ mRNA -> Pho5p abundance
    - Chimera w/o Pho2 -> -> Pho5p?

A comparison of the old (phoshatase) and new (flow cytometry) assay.
